context: Trimble Inc. is a positioning and workflow technology company focused on GPS, construction, agriculture, and transportation software. GPS technology for surveying and mapping.

competitors.name: Leica Geosystems
competitors.notes: Major competitor in surveying and geospatial solutions, known for precision measurement and data acquisition

competitors.name: Topcon Positioning Systems
competitors.notes: Global leader in positioning technology solutions for surveying, founded in 1932, predates Trimble

competitors.name: Sokkia
competitors.notes: Subsidiary of Topcon providing surveying instruments including total stations and GPS systems

competitors.name: Garmin Ltd.
competitors.notes: Competitor in GPS navigation and positioning technology

competitors.name: Carlson
competitors.notes: Offers surveying and civil engineering software and hardware
